cast.overview: The life of an unsuccessful writer is transformed by a top-secret 'smart drug' that allows him to use 100% of his brain and become a perfect version of himself. His enhanced abilities soon attract shadowy forces that threaten his new life.
cast.title: Limitless

details.biography: Nicolas was Born in Munich Germany and moved to Mexico with his parents in 1992. He met his wife Alexia in 2011 and they got married in Denver Colorado on January 11. 2012. They live in Denver Colorado and have a YouTube channel called Nicknlex. The have amassed around 60.000 subscribers. They have a dog called Marley. They are both fluent in English and Spanish. Nicola is fluent in is native German.  Nicolas and Alexia are both musicians. Alexia plays the bass while Nicolas is a classically trained guitarist.
details.name: Nicolas Le Guern
